translation.en: I have pineapples! I have strawberry!
translation.ja: パイナップルにイチゴ

translation.en: - I have grapes! I have grapefruit! -
translation.ja: ブドウに 　　グレープフルーツ

translation.en: Hey! We had a plan, Carter, and you done goofed it.
translation.ja: お前のせいで計画が台無しだ

translation.en: The plan's still on.
The plan was for you to get me B's.
- Does this look like a freaking B? - I just want what's best for you.
translation.ja: これがＢに見えるか？ 君のためを思って

translation.en: You know when the last time I got an A was?
translation.ja: Ａなんて取れると思うか？

translation.en: Okay, I'll act more stupid next time.
Completely moronic and idiotic. Beyond obtuse.
translation.ja: 想像以上の大バカ野郎に

translation.en: Yeah. Totally.
That's what I'm talking about.
You making fun of me? You're dead this time, Carter.
translation.ja: バカにしたな？ 今日はただじゃ済まねえぞ

translation.en: What the...
- - Hey! You go on now, little mutt.
Go on. Go on, dog. I'll turn you into a hot dog. Now, go on.
translation.ja: お前をホットドッグにするぞ

translation.en: I have grapefruit!
I have pineapples! I have strawberries!
translation.ja: パイナップルに 　　イチゴもあるよ

translation.en: Thank you very much. Have a nice day. Be careful with the cars.
translation.ja: ありがとう　車に気をつけて

translation.en: - You, too. - Okay.
translation.ja: おじさんも ありがとよ

translation.en: - Hey. - There you are.
translation.ja: よう やっと来た　また遅刻よ

translation.en: - You're late. Again. - Come on. I wanna go to Sam's.
translation.ja: やっと来た　また遅刻よ サムの店に行くぞ

translation.en: I was practicing for my recital.
translation.ja: 発表会の練習をしてた

translation.en: I'm gonna do five pirouettes all on my own.
translation.ja: ピルエットを５回するの

translation.en: - It's called a solo. You know that, right? - That's cool, Frankie.
translation.ja: “ソロ”でね　分かる？ すごいね

translation.en: And I'm gonna dance in New York, in Swan Lake, and be crazy famous.
translation.ja: ニューヨークで 有名になっても

translation.en: But I'll still talk to you.
Why wouldn't you talk to me?
Because famous people are always stuck up.
translation.ja: 有名人だと偉いからか

translation.en: I am not.
And I'm gonna wear my boots to do my pirouettes.
translation.ja: ピルエット用の靴も履くの

translation.en: Good luck with that.
Hey. You are coming, right?
- To my recital? - Yeah, sure.
If you don't come and Mom has to work, nobody will be there.
translation.ja: ママは仕事で来ないし お兄ちゃんしかいないの

translation.en: You'll be great.
I'll be there, Frankie. I promise.
translation.ja: ちゃんと行くよ　約束する

translation.en: That is if I invite you.
The tickets are for very important people only.
- Come on, let's get in the street car. - No, we can't!
translation.ja: 路面電車に乗ろう ダメだよ

translation.en: - You're the one who wanted to go to Sam's. - Wait, Frankie.
translation.ja: 店に行くんでしょ 待てよ　歩いて行きたいんだ

translation.en: - I wanna walk. - It'll be fine. Come on.
translation.ja: 待てよ　歩いて行きたいんだ 大丈夫だってば

translation.en: Why do you have strawberries?
What are you talking about?
I saw you have strawberries in your pocket in the car.
translation.ja: ポケットにイチゴが入ってる

translation.en: I don't have any strawberries.
I saw something red and green.
I don't have any strawberries in my pocket.
translation.ja: イチゴなんて持ってない

translation.en: Well, it smeared on the chair and you didn't wipe it up.
translation.ja: 潰れて 汁が垂れてたよ

translation.en: What do you mean you don't believe me?
You're gonna fly to Paris to dance? Not gonna happen.
translation.ja: パリへ踊りになんて行けない

translation.en: It will happen. I know it.
You know you need to punch Pig- Face in the face, right?
translation.ja: ブタ鼻を殴ってやりなよ

translation.en: - Frankie... I don't care. - He'll bully you your whole life.
translation.ja: フランキー 一生 イジメられる

translation.en: I'm not gonna fight back. I'd lose.
translation.ja: 殴らないよ　どうせ負ける

translation.en: Why are we going here again? It's just a waste of time.
translation.ja: 来ても時間のムダなのに 来ても時間のムダなのに 〝キング質店〞

translation.en: Because you never know, it could change sometimes.
- Maybe he's in a good mood today. - In your dreams.
translation.ja: 機嫌がいいかも あり得ない

translation.en: Hi, Mr. King. We're here for the watch.
translation.ja: キングさん　腕時計を見せて

translation.en: $4 and 26, 27, 28 cents.
That brings the total to $34 and 18... No, 19 cents.
translation.ja: 合計34ドルと18セント 違った　19セントだ

translation.en: Not bad, am I right?
- How much more do we have to go? - Oh, you don't even wanna know.
translation.ja: あといくら？ 知らないほうがいい

translation.en: - - Mr. King,
we've been coming here twice a week for a long time.
translation.ja: もう何回も店に来てる

translation.en: You can at least take the watch out of the For Sale case.
translation.ja: 並べないで しまってよ

translation.en: Please. He meant to say please.
I take it out of the case, people can't see it.
People can't see it, people can't buy it.
But we're gonna buy it. Eventually.
translation.ja: 僕たちが買います　いずれ

translation.en: Listen, I told both of you when we started this whole cockamamieness,
translation.ja: 言ったろ？ もし誰か買い手が現れたら

translation.en: that if somebody wants the watch, I'll let you know.
translation.ja: 知らせて 先に買うチャンスをやるって

translation.en: - Give you a chance to buy it first. - Yeah, but we should have--
translation.ja: 知らせて 先に買うチャンスをやるって そうだけど…

translation.en: There's no buts.
When I bought it from your mother, I paid her good money.
This is a business. Barely, but it is.
translation.ja: これでも商売だからな

translation.en: Mr. King, I promise you'll get money. We're at, like, $34 and 19 cents.
translation.ja: お金は払います もう34ドル19セントある

translation.en: - Baby, you see how old I am? - Old.
translation.ja: 私は何歳だ？ かなり

translation.en: A hundred?
You're not really helping your case.
The point is, at this rate, you guys will be bringing my money to the cemetery.
translation.ja: このペースじゃ 私はお墓で待つことになる

translation.en: I don't like the cemetery.
Listen, a guy came in, he liked the watch. I told him it ran slow.
translation.ja: ある客が欲しいと言ったが 壊れてると伝えた

translation.en: It doesn't run slow.
My father kept it in perfect condition, and you know that.
translation.ja: 父さんの時計は正確だから

translation.en: The point is, pudding head, he's not wearing it, is he?
translation.ja: つまり売れなかったんだ

translation.en: Mr. King, of all the people I don't like in this world,
translation.ja: キングさん 嫌いな人たちの中で―

translation.en: I like you the best.
You and every other woman in my life.
Now, you two, get out of here.
- We're just gonna keep coming back. - Yeah, like a rash.
translation.ja: また来るからね 参るよ

translation.en: - See ya tomorrow. - Take care.
- That was a waste of time. - No, it wasn't. We added more money.
translation.ja: 時間のムダだった そんなことないよ

translation.en: Next time, it'll be less money that we have to add.
Yeah, yeah, yeah.
You've been giving Mr. King your lunch money. I know you have.
translation.ja: あれ全部 昼食代でしょ？

translation.en: Maybe I wouldn't have to if Mom hadn't sold Dad's watch.
translation.ja: 母さんが時計を売るからだよ

translation.en: Lots of things aren't very good in life. Get used to it.
translation.ja: 人生は厳しいのさ 慣れろ

translation.en: You get used to being grounded forever or longer when Mom finds out.
translation.ja: ママにバレたら 絶対 許してもらえないわよ

translation.en: I was here first.
I'm older, so it doesn't matter. I'm always first.
Mom doesn't like it when you double dip.
Mom's not here, so if you just shut your mouth for once, you'll be fine.
translation.ja: 母さんは留守だ 少し黙っててくれよ

translation.en: Fine. I can keep my mouth shut so much that I'll never talk to you
translation.ja: 分かったわ 宇宙が消えるまで もう二度と話さない

translation.en: for all the time in all the universes in all the world.
translation.ja: 宇宙が消えるまで もう二度と話さない

translation.en: Thank goodness.
Carter...
Carter can't come to the phone right now.
translation.ja: 今 電話に出られません

translation.en: Please don't leave a message after the beep. Beep!
translation.ja: 伝言も受け付けていません

translation.en: Just look!
If you are satisfied with your message, please press 1 or hang up.
translation.ja: よろしければ切ってください

translation.en: Carter, just listen to me!
What?
No way.
I can't believe it. How did you even get up here?
translation.ja: どうやって上に来たんだ？

translation.en: You know this dog?
I was trying to get him to follow us home from school.
translation.ja: 帰りにエサで釣ろうと

translation.en: - I knew you were doing something not good. - Come on. Good boy.
translation.ja: 怪しいと思った おいで

translation.en: Come here. Good boy.
- What's your name, bud? - He's a stray.
Where did you come from?
A trash can?
He smells worse than your side of the room.
translation.ja: お兄ちゃんの陣地よりくさい

translation.en: You're right. Let's fix it.
translation.ja: 本当だ　何とかしよう

translation.en: ♪ I love my dog as much as I love you ♪
translation.ja: 君と同じくらい 　　愛犬が大好きだ

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.ja: 君が去っても 　　犬はいつもそばにいる

translation.en: ♪ All the pay I need Comes shining through his eyes ♪
♪ I don't need no cold water To make me realize ♪
translation.ja: 冷水を浴びなくても 　　ちゃんと分かってる

translation.en: ♪ That I love my dog As much as I love you ♪
translation.ja: 君と同じくらい 　　愛犬が大好きだ

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.ja: 君が去っても 　　犬はいつもそばにいる

translation.en: Carter, what are we gonna do about Mom?
What about her?
She's gonna freak out.
You asked for a bulldog for Christmas, and you got a stuffed animal.
translation.ja: 犬は飼ってくれなかった

translation.en: Which is why we're not gonna tell her. He's just gonna stay in our room for now.
translation.ja: だから内緒にする 僕たちの部屋に隠すだけだ

translation.en: Where's he gonna pee and poo?
In your bed?
Carter!
Just until I can convince her.
It's Mom. We'll never convince her. Like, ever.
translation.ja: ママだよ？ 説得できるわけないでしょ

translation.en: - Oh, crap. - Oh, no.
Hey, hey! Where are my two favorite people that help Mom out?
translation.ja: ママを手伝ってくれる かわいい２人はどこかしら？

translation.en: - Hey, Mom. - Hi, Mommy!
translation.ja: おかえり おかえり ママは世界一のママだよ

translation.en: You're the best mommy of all the mommies in all the world!
translation.ja: おかえり ママは世界一のママだよ

translation.en: Definitely, you're the best.
What'd you break?
Nothing.
Forks on the left, hon.
translation.ja: カーター　宿題は終わった？

translation.en: - Car, is all your homework done? - It will be.
translation.ja: カーター　宿題は終わった？ もうすぐ

translation.en: Here you go, Madame. Mushrooms on top.
translation.ja: はい　マッシュルーム入りね

translation.en: How about you, Mr. Man. Anything exciting happen at school today?
translation.ja: 学校で楽しいことはあった？

translation.en: Pig- Face happened.
Your death is about to happen.
Again? That's the third time. Okay, that's it. I'm calling the school.
translation.ja: また？　もう３回目でしょ 電話するわ

translation.en: Don't blow this up like you blow everything up.
I'm not blowing anything up. I wanna know who this kid is.
translation.ja: どういう子か知りたい

translation.en: I told you, Pig- Face.
- Can you butt out, Frankie? - Carter, what happened? Tell me the truth.
translation.ja: お前は黙ってろ 何があったか教えて 本当のことを

translation.en: - Carter, just-- - You don't wanna know the truth.
translation.ja: いいから… 知らないほうがいい

translation.en: - No. - Straight up, Carter.
translation.ja: ダメ その子が怖いの？

translation.en: - Are you scared of this kid? - No.
translation.ja: その子が怖いの？ 違う！

translation.en: 'Cause if you are, that's nothing...
- Go. - ...to be ashamed of.
- Just let me help you. - No. No.
Here you go. No mushrooms.
translation.ja: マッシュルーム抜きよ

translation.en: Um, actually, can I have mushrooms, please?
translation.ja: マッシュルーム入れて

translation.en: - You hate mushrooms. - But taste buds change every seven years.
translation.ja: 嫌いでしょ？ 好みは７年ごとに変わる

translation.en: - That's a scientific fact. - He's right. Very, very right.
translation.ja: 事実だ そう　本当だよ

translation.en: Mushrooms.
Okay.
I'm just worried about you, Carter.
- You're worried about everything. - That is not true.
translation.ja: 心配しすぎだよ そんなことない

translation.en: Okay, maybe that is a little bit true. A little bit.
translation.ja: まあ確かに 少し そうかもしれないけど

translation.en: Anyway, here you go.
What is going on with you guys?
- Nothing. - Nothing.
I feel like you're hiding something from me.
Okay. Mom, let's just calm down and eat our food.
translation.ja: いいから落ち着いて食べよう

translation.en: - - Okay, I...
I know that things have been hard,
translation.ja: ２人とも つらいとは思う

translation.en: and you guys wake up in the morning and I'm already at work,
translation.ja: ママは仕事で忙しくて

translation.en: and you've been on your own a lot lately.
translation.ja: 最近は留守の時間が多い

translation.en: But I just want you to know that you can talk to me, you know?
translation.ja: でも隠し事をする必要はない

translation.en: Really, I'm right here.
translation.ja: ちゃんと話を聞くから

translation.en: We do talk to you, Mom.
Don't worry.
We love you, Mom, to the moon and back.
translation.ja: 大好き　月の果てまで

translation.en: To the moon and back.
This is the Aitken Basin, formed 4.5 billion years ago,
translation.ja: エイトケン盆地 45億年も大昔にできたんだよ

translation.en: which in dog years is a lot.
translation.ja: 45億年も大昔にできたんだよ

translation.en: My dad showed it to me on an electron telescope at the planetarium he ran.
translation.ja: 父さんに プラネタリウムで教わった

translation.en: Wanna know something more interesting?
This is my favorite ballerina book. Isn't she pretty?
translation.ja: 私の大好きなバレリーナよ

translation.en: - Hey, stop chewing on that. -
And this is the Nutcracker.
translation.ja: これは「くるみ割り人形」

translation.en: It's about an evil rat king.
translation.ja: ネズミの王様が悪なの

translation.en: - Die, Rat King, die. -
Mom will hear you.
Hey, what if we named him Michael Jordan?
translation.ja: 名前はマイケル･ジョーダン

translation.en: That's the dumbest name for a dog I've ever heard.
Okay. What about Copernicus?
translation.ja: それならコペルニクスは？

translation.en: What is going on in your mind? No.
translation.ja: 何考えてるの？　ダメよ

translation.en: This is my favorite, Sleeping Beauty. There's a lot of kissing.
translation.ja: 「眠れる森の美女」も キスがあって好き

translation.en: Look, Benjamin Franklin had a dog. He thought they were more reliable than people.
translation.ja: ベンジャミン･ フランクリンにも忠犬がいた

translation.en: That's not very interesting.
Yeah, but what about Benjamin, as his name?
translation.ja: ベンジャミンって名前は？

translation.en: Mmm... What about Benji?
He does look kind of like a Benji. He's old and new at the same time.
translation.ja: 似合うかも　古いけど新しい

translation.en: - Yeah. -
Good boy. Good boy.
translation.ja: いい子だ よしよし

translation.en: Dad would let us keep Benji.
translation.ja: 父さんなら飼わせてくれた

translation.en: Carter...
I don't wanna say goodbye to Benji.
translation.ja: ベンジーと離れたくない

translation.en: I don't like goodbye.
Promise me we won't have to.
translation.ja: 離れないって約束して

translation.en: Hey, I promise you, Fritter.
translation.ja: 約束するよ　フランキー

translation.en: I love you, guys.
I love you too, Frankie.
And now I lay me down to sleep,
I pray the Lord for this dog to keep.
translation.ja: この子を飼えますように

translation.en: And that I will do incredible at my recital.
translation.ja: 発表会がうまくいって―

translation.en: And that my spelling teacher will quit her job forever and never come back.
translation.ja: 国語の先生が辞めますように

translation.en: And that Mommy will not have to worry so much.
translation.ja: あとママが 心配しなくて済みますように

translation.en: And that I'll never have to eat any more mushrooms as long as I live.
translation.ja: マッシュルームもいらない

translation.en: Amen.
Good night, Benji.
translation.ja: おやすみ　ベンジー

translation.en: I don't know what to do, you know?
translation.ja: どうすればいいか分からない

translation.en: They're getting so big, and they're so smart, and they catch on to things and...
translation.ja: ２人とも どんどん成長して賢くなる

translation.en: And I'm trying to keep everything together.
translation.ja: 何とか母親らしくしたいけど

translation.en: It's like I'm nothing but a nag.
All of a sudden, I'm so serious.
translation.ja: いつの間にか 余裕のない人間になってた

translation.en: Every day I feel like I'm messing them up and letting them down.
translation.ja: 毎日 私は失敗ばかりして 子供たちを― 失望させてる

translation.en: I don't know how to be in three places at once.
translation.ja: でも１人じゃ全部できない

translation.en: So, feel free to give me some advice
translation.ja: 助言があれば言ってね

translation.en: or one of your lame science jokes, or...
translation.ja: 退屈な科学ジョークでもいい

translation.en: a carton of ice cream and bingeing...
translation.ja: アイスとお酒もいいな

translation.en: 'cause I could really use it.
Just a quick kiss before I go to work.
translation.ja: 行ってきますのキスをさせて

translation.en: - Carter? - Good morning, Mom.
translation.ja: カーター？ おはよう

translation.en: What is that?
A stuffed animal.  An animatronic one.
Okay. All right. I'm on to you two.
translation.ja: なるほどね 分かったわ

translation.en: This is why you guys were being weird last night.
translation.ja: だから昨日は変だったのね

translation.en: He's cute. Mom, look at him.
translation.ja: 見て　かわいいでしょ？

translation.en: You know what? I expected Carter to lie to me because he's almost a teenager, but you?
translation.ja: フランキー あなたまでウソをつくなんて

translation.en: Mom, we're not lying. We just didn't tell you yet.
translation.ja: 言うのが遅れただけだよ

translation.en: Where did he come from?
Uh, he kind of found me.
On the street, we saved him.
On the street?
No. Okay.
translation.ja: やめて　分かったから

translation.en: - - All right, I got it.
You're cute, but you are a dog and you poop everywhere,
translation.ja: でも犬だわ ウンチをするし 物をかむし

translation.en: and you mess everything up, you chew on things,
translation.ja: ウンチをするし 物をかむし

translation.en: you keep us up at night.
He loves you, Mommy.
No. Okay? I can barely keep the three of us afloat.
translation.ja: ダメよ ３人で手一杯なの

translation.en: It's not happening.
Mom, you don't have to worry. We'll take care of him.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　僕らが世話するよ

translation.en: I don't have the money or the time.
It's not happening. I'm taking him to a shelter.
They murder- kill dogs there. You can't take him there.
translation.ja: 保健所に入れたら殺される

translation.en: - No, they don't. - Are you kidding me?
translation.ja: 殺さない 保健所？　本気なの？

translation.en: A shelter?
They won't even give him three days.
I won't let them hurt him.
translation.ja: そんなことさせないわ

translation.en: Yeah, you will. You don't care.
He's a good boy, and you won't even give him a chance.
translation.ja: こんなにいい子なのに

translation.en: Carter, no, okay?
I'm sorry... I don't...
I can't take care of one more thing right now.
translation.ja: 荷物は抱えられないの

translation.en: He's not a thing. He's Benji.
translation.ja: 荷物じゃない　ベンジーよ

translation.en: You named him?
I'm so sorry that you can't handle one more thing right now,
translation.ja: ママは無理かもしれない

translation.en: but what about us?
We take care of each other, so I'm pretty sure that we can handle a dog.
translation.ja: 犬の世話くらいできるよ

translation.en: Maybe he'll make things fun around here for once.
translation.ja: 少しは笑顔が戻るかも

translation.en: Oh, I forgot. That's not allowed, either.
translation.ja: ごめん　それも禁止だったね

translation.en: Carter, no... That's not fair.
- Just leave us alone. -
I don't even like that stupid dog.
translation.ja: 知らない　犬が何よ

translation.en: Carter...
Mom won't let you stay.
translation.ja: 母さんが飼えないって

translation.en: You'll wind up in a pound.
translation.ja: 保健所に連れてかれる

translation.en: Just go.
Go, please.
I love you, Benji.
translation.ja: 大好きだよ　ベンジー

translation.en: ♪ If your heart believes in dreamin' ♪
translation.ja: 心のうちに 　　夢を抱けるなら

translation.en: ♪ There's no other place I know ♪
translation.ja: 行くべきところは 　　　　　決まってる

translation.en: ♪ Well, life here rolls on by Without a care for tomorrow ♪
translation.ja: そこでは明日を 　　気にすることもない

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, that was the life for me That was the life for me ♪
translation.ja: 僕の暮らしは そこにある 僕は そこで生きてきた

translation.en: ♪ How long must I travel On this journey? ♪
translation.ja: この旅は 　　いつまで続くのだろう

translation.en: ♪ Guess I'll count a million stars Along the way ♪
translation.ja: 幾千もの星を 　　数えることになるだろう

translation.en: ♪ And every time I start to worry ♪ ♪ Oh ♪
translation.ja: それでも 　　不安になると必ず

translation.en: ♪ Something whispers in my ear ♪
translation.ja: 何かが耳に 　　ささやいてくれる

translation.en: ♪ Says the words I long to hear ♪
translation.ja: ずっと聞きたかった言葉を

translation.en: ♪ Almost home ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ Might be lost and afraid ♪
translation.ja: 道に迷い 不安な時も

translation.en: ♪ But I'm just a dream away ♪
translation.ja: 夢では すぐそこに家がある

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ Just one more mile And I'll be home free ♪
translation.ja: あと１マイルで 　　家にたどり着ける

translation.en: ♪ Just one more day Is all my heart needs ♪
translation.ja: あと１日あれば 　　安らぎが得られる

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get there ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm gonna get there someday ♪
translation.ja: 家に たどり着けるから いつか必ず

translation.en: ♪ Feel so cold and alone But I'm... ♪
translation.ja: たとえ寒くて孤独でも 　　　　　　　もう少しだ

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
- Did you not eat lunch again? - I ate lunch.
translation.ja: また昼を抜いた？ 食べたよ

translation.en: - Then how come you got more money for Sam? - I don't.
translation.ja: なら お金は？ ない

translation.en: Then how come we're going to Sam's?
To get my money back.
If you get our money back, how do we get Dad's watch back?
translation.ja: パパの腕時計はどうするの？

translation.en: Mom doesn't care. She wouldn't let us keep Benji.
translation.ja: ママはベンジーを捨てた

translation.en: Why should I care about getting her the watch back?
translation.ja: 時計を取り返す必要がある？

translation.en: Because we're a family.
Whatever.
You're just scared of somebody else buying it.
translation.ja: 先に買われるのが怖いのね

translation.en: I'm not scared. I'm realistic, Frankie.
translation.ja: 違う　現実的なだけだ

translation.en: I told you she wouldn't let us keep him.
translation.ja: 飼えないと分かってた

translation.en: You're not real or listic or whatever. You're just chicken.
translation.ja: 現実的でも何でもないでしょ

translation.en: You give up at everything when not very good things happen.
translation.ja: 嫌なことから すぐ逃げる

translation.en: - Mr. King, we need to talk. - ...hold up.
translation.ja: キングさん　話がある

translation.en: Hey, you kids, I sold the watch.
translation.ja: もうあの腕時計は売ったよ

translation.en: You two go on back home now.
- You what? - Sold the watch.
translation.ja: 何て？ 腕時計は売った

translation.en: You sold the watch? That's not right.
- Y'all go on now. Go home. - You know what?
translation.ja: もう帰りなさい ウソつき！　警察を呼ぶわ

translation.en: I'm gonna call the police and tell them you are a lying liar.
translation.ja: ウソつき！　警察を呼ぶわ

translation.en: You can't sell the watch.
- How y'all doing? -
Now, I remember being a kid.
I used to tell my brother there I was gonna beat him with a baseball bat,
translation.ja: 兄貴をバットで殴ると脅した

translation.en: but I didn't really mean it.
When you say you're gonna go get the police,
that's just you being a kid, right?
Yeah, just talking.
Good, but just in case, y'all are gonna stick around for a while.
translation.ja: よかった でも念のため残るんだ

translation.en: Man, you don't need to handle kids like that.
translation.ja: 手荒にすることはない

translation.en: - Shh. - Let go.
You don't have to do that. Leave 'em alone!
translation.ja: 子供たちは放してやってくれ

translation.en: Open the safe. Fill the bag. Do it.
- Not until you let them kids go. - Mr. Pawn Man,
translation.ja: 子供を放してからだ おい 親父 このふざけたマスクを見ろ

translation.en: put yourself in the shoes of two fellas who would come in here wearing
translation.ja: おい 親父 このふざけたマスクを見ろ

translation.en: these ridiculous masks. Do I look like I'm playing?
translation.ja: おい 親父 このふざけたマスクを見ろ 遊びに見えるか？

translation.en: Open the safe! Hurry up.
translation.ja: 金庫を開けろ　早く！

translation.en: Y'all calm down.
- Open up the safe, now! - Don't hurt them kids.
translation.ja: 早く開けろ 子供を放せ

translation.en: Do it, before I hop that counter and slap the taste out your mouth. Come on, hurry up!
translation.ja: ぶん殴られる前にやるんだな

translation.en: Speed it up. Come on!
Comin'.
You got what you came for. Now go on.
translation.ja: 満足だろ　出てってくれ

translation.en: Tie him up. Let's go.
Move. Come on, back door.
- Man, wait. - Tie him up.
- Where you taking them kids? - Move! The backdoor. Go. Get out.
translation.ja: どこに連れていく？ 裏口から外に出ろ

translation.en: Sit down. Sit down. Sit down.
Let us go.
Y'all gonna sit here, stay quiet for ten minutes, and then forget any of this ever happened.
translation.ja: 10分待って 全部 忘れるんだ

translation.en: If you don't, me and my brother will pay a little visit to your home. Understand?
translation.ja: でなきゃ家に行くからな いいな？

translation.en: - Help! - Hurry up.
- Over here! - Mr. King!
Frankie, stop!
Get up. Get up.
- Help! Help us! - Let us go!
- Get in the van. - Carter?
- Wait. What are you doing? - They saw my face.
translation.ja: 何してるんだ？ 顔を見られた

translation.en: - Help! Someone, help us! - They kids.
Now they've seen your face, too. Get in the van.
Please let us go.
- We didn't do anything. - Go on. Get in the van.
Please.
Help! Help!
Frankie.
Damn. Is that your dog?
translation.ja: クソ　お前らの犬か？

translation.en: Get out the way!
- You get this is kidnapping, right? - It's more like saving our butts.
translation.ja: これじゃ誘拐(ゆうかい)だぞ 自己防衛だ

translation.en: - - Find the phone, Titus. Hurry up.
- Mommy! - Get rid of it.
translation.ja: ママ！ 邪魔だ　窓から捨てろ

translation.en: - Get it out the window, idiot. - I'm getting it!
translation.ja: 邪魔だ　窓から捨てろ

translation.en: Please stop.
We in too deep now, brother. We can't do that.
translation.ja: 今さら遅いぜ　兄貴

translation.en: He's gone.
- Stop driving! - We can't stop!
translation.ja: 車を止めろ 無理だ

translation.en: - We can stop! - No, we can't!
translation.ja: 無理じゃない 無理だよ

translation.en: Syd, where are you taking us?
Don't worry. I got this covered, I promise.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ　俺に任せろ

translation.en: Why are you so ugly?
Wanna say that again?
translation.ja: もう一度 言ってみろ

translation.en: Hey! What are you doing back there?
Nothing. It's just my lunch.
- What is that? - Do not take your eye off of him.
translation.ja: これは何だ？ 目を離すな

translation.en: Don't you never call me ugly. Never!
translation.ja: 二度と醜いと言うな いいな！

translation.en: Hurry up. Hurry up. Hurry up.
translation.ja: もたもたするな　入れ

translation.en: Tie 'em up in that back room.
- Hurry up. - Let me go!
Hey.
translation.ja: いいか　固く結べよ

translation.en: - Double knots. Put the tarp on the van. - They ain't going anywhere.
translation.ja: いいか　固く結べよ 車も隠せ 逃がしはしないさ

translation.en: Give me your hands.
Please.
I'm almost done with my shift, and I haven't heard from you guys.
translation.ja: もうすぐ仕事が終わる

translation.en: I know that you're mad at me, but you have to tell me where you are.
translation.ja: 怒ってるだろうけど連絡して

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry.
And I love you.
So call me, okay?
translation.ja: お願いだから電話して

translation.en: What'd you pick this place for? Gives me the creeps.
translation.ja: なぜここに？　気味が悪い

translation.en: So nobody comes sniffing around.
- What're you doing, man? - Checking our score.
I mean with them. I didn't sign up for no kidnapping.
translation.ja: 子供たちだ　誘拐だなんて…

translation.en: Let me make something real clear to you.
There are people that want money from us, but we ain't got no money, do we?
translation.ja: 俺たちにはカネが必要だ

translation.en: So they gonna break every bone in our body instead.
translation.ja: 払えなきゃ半殺しにされる

translation.en: That what you signed up for?
I don't owe those people nothing. That's all you.
translation.ja: 全部 お前の借金だろ

translation.en: Who took care of you seven years, huh?
Food, clothes, all that?
I was the one who figured out a way for us to keep on even when our own parents wouldn't.
translation.ja: 親に見放され 俺が生きる道を見つけた

translation.en: What I owe, you owe.
- All right. So what's the plan? - Sell all this, pay off our debt.
translation.ja: どうするんだ？ 売って借金を返す

translation.en: Keep them around in case we need a get- out- of- jail- free card.
translation.ja: ガキは逃亡用の切り札だ

translation.en: And then what?
And then we no longer need 'em.
She's cold.
So what?
- So what? - I like this here watch.
translation.ja: 何だ？ いい腕時計だ

translation.en: A lot.
It actually reminds me of a watch my daddy had.
translation.ja: 親父の腕時計を思い出す

translation.en: Give it back!
Was this the reason y'all was in the shop today?
translation.ja: これが欲しくて店に来たのか

translation.en: To the man of my dreams. I love you more than the moon and the stars.
translation.ja: “最愛の人へ あなたを月よりも愛してる”

translation.en: Love, W. That's nice.
Let me work this here.
Your daddy run off. Got sick and tired of you, your old mama.
translation.ja: ママとお前たちを捨てて パパが逃げて―

translation.en: So she sold it. It's good riddance.
But then, y'all want a little something something to remember him by.
translation.ja: でもお前らは 思い出として欲しくなった

translation.en: Ain't that right, little man?
Tell me how bad you want it.
Come on. Tell me.
It's yours, ain't it?
You can take it from me.
Take it. Take it.
Yeah.
What you scared of?
You're a little coward, huh?
Just like your old man.
Sic, Rott! Sic him!
- We okay? - You, too, dumbo.
translation.ja: 大丈夫か？ お前もだ

translation.en: Go. Go!
translation.ja: ほら　さっさと行け

translation.en: Hey!
Dumb move, dog.
Where are you?
- - Hey!
Hey!
Help!
Day keeps getting better.
Little doggie.
Where you at, baby boy?
Come out and play.
Little doggie.
Where are you?
I'm gonna skin you alive.
Gonna wipe that stupid grin off your face.
translation.ja: ニヤケ顔を消してやる

translation.en: Where you at?
Benji!
Come here, boy. Get this. Please, get this.
translation.ja: よし　これをほどいて

translation.en: Good boy.
I hate that dog!
translation.ja: 俺はあの犬が…　大嫌いだ！

translation.en: - Please, Benji, hurry. - It's stuck. He can't get it.
translation.ja: 急いで ほどけない

translation.en: - Please, Benji. - Come on!
- - Where is he?
Oh, I think Rottie smells him.
translation.ja: ロット　何かにおうか？

translation.en: - Where could he be? -
translation.ja: 一体 どこにいるんだろうな

translation.en: - Get him, Rott. - No!
Run, Benji, run!
- - Don't hurt him!
Run, Benji!
Help! Get me out of here.
Hey, who is that?
- - Is that a dog?
What are you doing in here?
Puppy, bark for me!
Where'd you go, puppy? Come on, puppy.
Where'd you go? I know you're out there.
What are you doing out there?
Come on, puppy. Come on, puppy. Come on.
translation.ja: 頼む　何とか助けてくれ

translation.en: Hey, puppy, come on back now.
What're you... Are you trying to get the lock?
translation.ja: カギを回そうとしてるのか？

translation.en: Come on, puppy, you can do it! I know you can.
translation.ja: 頑張ってくれ きっとお前なら開けられる

translation.en: Come on, pup. Don't leave me now. Don't give up, puppy.
translation.ja: 頼む　諦めないでくれ

translation.en: Come on, baby. I know you can do it. Come on, puppy. You almost got it. Get it.
translation.ja: お前ならできる よし　もう少しだ

translation.en: Come on, pup. Come on, I know you can do it.
translation.ja: 頑張れ！ もう少しだ

translation.en: Puppy, thank you! You opened the door!
translation.ja: いいぞ よくやった！

translation.en: Yes, yes, hey. Good boy.
Wait. Where's Carter and Frankie?
translation.ja: カーターとフランキーは？

translation.en: Yes, sir. I'll keep you posted. Yeah.
Sam King? Sam King?
Detective Lyle Burton. How you doing?
- Hey. Listen. You got to find the kids. - Trust me, we're gonna find them.
translation.ja: 子供たちを捜してください 必ず見つけます

translation.en: Did you see what the guys look like?
- No, they were wearing-- - I got something.
Okay. Hold on for a second, okay? What you got? What you got?
translation.ja: 待っててください 何だ？

translation.en: I found it out back.
- Sam! Where's Frankie and Carter? - Lord, Ms. Hughes, I'm so sorry.
- What happened? - Ms. Hughes, I'm Detective Lyle Burton.
translation.ja: 申し訳ない ヒューズさん　警察が…

translation.en: - We're gonna do everything we can-- - Why were they even here?
translation.ja: ヒューズさん　警察が… なぜ ここにいたの？

translation.en: - It's the watch. - The watch?
Your husband's watch. The kids have been coming in every day almost trying to buy it back.
translation.ja: 旦那さんの腕時計を 買い戻すため 何度も店に

translation.en: I told them that I sold it. I didn't know that they'd come in here to...
translation.ja: あの子たちが そんなこと…

translation.en: - Hey! What... - Get him. What...
- What is he doing here? - That dog saved me.
translation.ja: あれは… 私を助けた犬だ

translation.en: - Is he yours? - No. What... He what?
translation.ja: 私を助けた犬だ 何て？

translation.en: He got me out of the dang closet they locked me in.
translation.ja: カギを開けてくれたんです

translation.en: We need to follow procedure, okay?
I think he's trying to tell you something.
Ms. Hughes! Ms. Hughes!
Stay put. Requesting backup. I got a 2- 12 on foot.
translation.ja: 待ってて 至急 応援を頼む

translation.en: Suspect identification?
Uh, brown hair, 35 pounds, four legs.
translation.ja: 毛は茶色 体重16キロで犬だ

translation.en: You wanna repeat that, Burton?
Not especially.
Ms. Hughes, let me do my job.
I'm following that dog.
Listen, we'll find them.
translation.ja: 犬を追うので乗ってください

translation.en: - We will follow the dog. Just come on. - Fine. Let's go.
translation.ja: 犬を追うので乗ってください お願い　急いで

translation.en: - Hey, hold up, hold up. - Sam?
About to catch a heart attack.
Get in the car. Let's go!
Hey, hey. No, no, no, you wait. Wait here. I got it.
translation.ja: 待っててください　任せて

translation.en: Must be out of my doggoned mind.
The heck you sniffing around for?
What you got?
What? What is that?
Pudding? Does it look like I want pudding?
translation.ja: プリン？ 俺にくれるのか？

translation.en: - - What will I do with that? Is that why you brought us here?
Okay.
And then you walk off. Great.
Stop. Just stop.
No, stop. Just stop!
Do you have any idea how much time I've wasted?
translation.ja: おかげで時間をムダにしたわ

translation.en: My kids are...
I don't wanna see you ever again. Go.
Do you hear me? Go!
What the heck were you thinking, Street? We got procedure, son.
translation.ja: 何を考えてる？　手順を守れ

translation.en: Sir, I know. I got carried away.
Ms. Hughes? Here's a cup of jasmine tea. It manifests good fortune.
translation.ja: ジャスミン茶でもいかが？ 幸運を呼びます

translation.en: - Thank you. - You're welcome.
translation.ja: ありがとう どういたしまして

translation.en: How much money had they saved up?
It doesn't matter. I should've given them the watch back.
translation.ja: 腕時計は返すべきでした

translation.en: No, I never should have sold it.
translation.ja: 売った私が悪いんです

translation.en: I should've done something
so they didn't think that buying a watch would make it all okay.
translation.ja: あの子たちに 余計な心配をさせてしまった

translation.en: The honest truth is, Ms. Hughes...
I didn't give the watch back, 'cause I like having 'em come in.
translation.ja: 腕時計を返さなかったんです

translation.en: Those two, they got nothing but love in 'em.
translation.ja: あの子たちは本当に優しい

translation.en: - I got something. - It's Carter's.
translation.ja: 携帯が 息子のです

translation.en: A traffic cop found it.
translation.ja: 交通係が見つけました

translation.en: No usable prints, but it's a starting point, location- wise.
translation.ja: 何かの手がかりになるかも

translation.en: Hey, come on. Give me my phone back.
Don't eat the rubber ducky. Give me that back. Good boy. Good boy.
translation.ja: アヒルはダメ 食べないで　いい子だ

translation.en: - Who's a good boy? - What's his name, anyways?
I don't think he has one. He's a stray.
translation.ja: ないと思う　野良犬だから

translation.en: Hey, where did you come from, buddy? Do you need a home?
translation.ja: どこから来たの？ おうちは？

translation.en: What are you thinking? What if Mom finds out?
translation.ja: ママにバレたらどうするの？

translation.en: I'm thinking he's lonely.
What are we gonna name him?
Like there's even a reason to name him. Mom will never let us keep him.
translation.ja: ダメだよ ママが飼わせてくれない

translation.en: It's kind of like...
when Dad got sick, Mom did, too.
translation.ja: 病気になって 母さんも元気がなくなった

translation.en: I miss Dad, but I miss Mom even more.
translation.ja: パパに会いたい ママにも会いたい

translation.en: I know, Fritter. I know.
translation.ja: 分かるよ　フランキー

translation.en: ♪ When the road gets dark ♪
♪ And you can no longer see ♪
♪ Just let my love throw a spark ♪
translation.ja: 僕の愛で 　　照らしてあげるよ

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.ja: だから少しだけ 　　　　僕を信じて

translation.en: ♪ When the tears you cry ♪
translation.ja: 流れ落ちる涙のほかに―

translation.en: ♪ Are all you can believe ♪
translation.ja: 何も信じられない時は

translation.en: ♪ Just give these lovin' arms a try Baby ♪
translation.ja: 僕が この両腕で 　　抱きしめてあげるよ

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.ja: だから少しだけ 　　　　僕を信じて

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.ja: ほんの少しでいいんだ

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.ja: 少しでいいから 　　　　僕を信じて

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.ja: ほんの少しだけ 　　　　僕を信じて

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.ja: 少しでいいから 　　　　僕を信じて

translation.en: ♪ And when your back's against the wall ♪  Hey, dog!
♪ Just turn around and you will see ♪
translation.ja: 振り返れば 　　僕がそこにいるから

translation.en: ♪ I will catch you I will catch your fall, baby ♪
translation.ja: 君が倒れないように 　　僕が受け止めるから

translation.en: ♪ Just have a little faith in me ♪
translation.ja: だから少しだけ 　　　　僕を信じて

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.ja: ほんの少しでいいんだ

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.ja: 少しだけ 　　僕を信じてみて

translation.en: ♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
translation.ja: ほんの少しでいいから…

translation.en: Come on, what'd I tell you? Hear me, boy?
translation.ja: 歩け　何度も言わせるな

translation.en: - We'll get out of here. - I don't wanna go anymore.
translation.ja: 歩け　何度も言わせるな もう疲れた

translation.en: Look at my face. See how much I care?
Go on. Come on, Titus. Let's go.
Uh... What are we doing, man?
Listen. I know a guy, all right?
He's gonna buy our score and take us up river.
translation.ja: 川上に運んでくれるさ

translation.en: I mean, with them.
They're coming with us. Come on.
What are you saying?
Don't worry your pretty little head about it.
What y'all doing over there?
- Nothing. - Nothing.
Nothing.
- Ain't we clever? -
translation.ja: 賢いじゃないか 許して

translation.en: - No, please, please. - Please. Please.
Let me be real clear...
I don't need but one of y'all to be my insurance policy. You hear me?
translation.ja: ２人とも生かしておく必要は ないんだぞ

translation.en: Get goin'. Go on.
Titus!
- Ms. Hughes... - I have to go find my kids.
translation.ja: ヒューズさん 待ってください

translation.en: - Just give me a second. - I can't just sit here any longer.
translation.ja: ヒューズさん 待ってください 捜しに行きます　待てない

translation.en: - I have to go. - You have to be rational.
Ms. Hughes! I have a lead.
translation.ja: 手がかりが見つかったんです

translation.en: What?
This van. It was stolen two days ago.
- And you think that they're in there? - Yeah.
translation.ja: 犯人の車？ 川辺の家に向かったので

translation.en: It raced out of the quarter down towards the river.
translation.ja: 川辺の家に向かったので

translation.en: That's right where the dog was taking us.
- It's just a coincidence. - How is that a coincidence?
translation.ja: 偶然でしょう 偶然？

translation.en: - Listen, the house was empty. - Maybe you didn't look hard enough.
translation.ja: 誰もいなかった 見落としじゃ？

translation.en: You're talking as if you think a dog is smarter than the police.
translation.ja: 犬のほうが賢いとでも？

translation.en: I'm going back to the house.
We need to follow protocol this time!
Detective...
I don't think that dog was following any kind of protocol.
translation.ja: あの犬は手順に従わなかった

translation.en: I think he was following his heart.
If anybody ask, I'm following the lead, all right?
translation.ja: 誰かに聞かれたら捜査中だと

translation.en: Don't you worry. I'm real good at not telling the police things.
translation.ja: ご心配なく 警察への隠し事は慣れてる

translation.en: Ms. Hughes!
Boat's coming in, Syd.
I'm on lookout. Flag him down. He's got the cash for the loot.
translation.ja: 案内しろ　ブツも売る

translation.en: There's our ride.
Stay.
Carter, I always pretend like I'm not scared,
translation.ja: 今まで平気なフリしてたけど

translation.en: but I'm really scared.
I'm really scared.
translation.ja: 怖いよ　お兄ちゃん

translation.en: Please, God.
Please help us get back home.
translation.ja: おうちに帰れますように

translation.en: Please, please, please.
translation.ja: お願いします 神様

translation.en: Please.
This wasn't open before.
Are you sure?
I'm sure.
Oh, you got to be kidding me.
- What? What is that? - Hey, relax.
It's an underground transport tunnel,
built way back for things you don't even wanna know about.
translation.ja: 大昔に作られたものです

translation.en: - You think they went... Carter! Frankie! - What you doing?
translation.ja: まさか… カーター　フランキー！

translation.en: - Those are my kids! - Relax. Listen. We can cut 'em off.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて 先回りできるはず

translation.en: - There's a river. I'll make a call. Okay? - Okay.
translation.ja: 川に向かいます　連絡を 待って　キーを貸して

translation.en: - Wait! Give me your keys. - Huh?
translation.ja: 待って　キーを貸して

translation.en: - I drive an ambulance for a living. - No.
translation.ja: 救急車の運転手よ 断る

translation.en: No!
You call this driving?
Not yet.
Benji! Help!
Help us!
Help us, Benji! Help!
Here's your money. We leave in five.
translation.ja: カネだ　出発は５分後に

translation.en: You're not your brother.
translation.ja: あの人とは違うでしょ？

translation.en: My brother thinks I'm stupid.
translation.ja: 弟は俺をバカにしてる

translation.en: He thinks he's the boss of me.
- But I can make decisions for myself. - Yeah.
translation.ja: でも自分で決められる そうよ

translation.en: That's why I'm taking this here cash...
translation.ja: だから俺はカネをもらって

translation.en: all for me...
and bailin'...
so I don't never have to listen to another thing he says...
translation.ja: 弟の言いなりになりたくない

translation.en: never again.
Who's ugly now?
Hey, my man! Can you help us out? Have you seen these two kids?
translation.ja: すみません この子たちを見ました？

translation.en: A van? Anything out of the ordinary?
No, sir, I never seen 'em.
Help! Help!
Benji.
- That her dog? - Yeah. Whether she knows it or not.
translation.ja: 彼女の犬？ そうらしい

translation.en: Okay, I'm requesting backup. I'm at the boatyard, right off...
translation.ja: 応援を頼む 場所は川辺のボートヤード…

translation.en: Hey!
- - It's a little late, you idiot.
Come on, I thought we was friends.
You got the right to pretty much nothing.
translation.ja: おとなしくしろ　逮捕する

translation.en: Benji!
Cut the rope, idiot!
Don't you ever quit?
- - Benji!
You thought that dog was gonna save you?
You're not going anywhere.
- Yeah, we are. - What are you gonna do, big man?
translation.ja: 逃げるさ どうやって？

translation.en: About time.
- Frankie, Carter! - Mommy!
translation.ja: フランキー　カーター！ ママ！

translation.en: Benji.
Benji! Benji!
I love you, Benji.
translation.ja: 大好きだよ　ベンジー

translation.en: - Benji? Ben? -
He didn't give up. - Good boy. Good boy. - Benji.
translation.ja: 諦めなかったんだね　偉いぞ

translation.en: - I love you. - I don’t have to say goodbye.
translation.ja: 大好きよ 離れたくなかった

translation.en: - Thank God. - Thank you.
Get your hands off me.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. I got him. I got him.
Thank you.
This is going back where it belongs.
Watch your head.
Hello.
Did good today. Good boy.
translation.ja: 助かったよ　いい子(ボーイ)だ

translation.en: What you doing?
Oh, I had no idea.
You're a good girl. You're a very good girl.
translation.ja: いい子(ガール)だ　よくやった

translation.en: Thank you.
- I'm so glad you're back. - We're keeping him, right?
translation.ja: 無事でよかった 一緒に住める？

translation.en: - I don't know. - Mom!
We're definitely keeping him.
We're gonna bake cookies and play dress up and you can help me with ballet.
translation.ja: 一緒にドレスを着たり バレエも…

translation.en: Stop. You're scaring him.
translation.ja: よせ　怖がってるだろ

translation.en: ♪ I feel love ♪
♪ All around ♪
♪ I can feel it ♪
♪ Shinin' down ♪
♪ It lights up the day Like the mornin' sun ♪
translation.ja: 朝の日差しのように 　　　　　辺りを照らし

translation.en: ♪ Reachin' out and touchin' everyone ♪
translation.ja: 誰にでも手を差し伸べ 　　　みんなの心に触れる

translation.en: ♪ I feel love ♪
♪ All day long ♪
♪ Like a promise ♪
♪ Like a song ♪
♪ And it's feelin' good ♪
translation.ja: 今は とても満たされてる

translation.en: ♪ Like I knew it would ♪
translation.ja: 思い描いていたとおり

translation.en: ♪ Everywhere I go ♪
♪ I feel love ♪
♪ If your heart believes in dreamin' ♪
translation.ja: 心のうちに 　　夢を抱けるなら

translation.en: ♪ There's no other place I know ♪
translation.ja: 行くべきところは 　　　　　決まってる

translation.en: ♪ Well, life here rolls on by Without a care for tomorrow ♪
translation.ja: そこでは明日を 　　気にすることもない

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, that was the life for me That was the life for me ♪
translation.ja: 僕の暮らしは 　　　そこにある 僕は そこで生きてきた

translation.en: ♪ How long must I travel On this journey? ♪
translation.ja: この旅は いつまで 　　　　 続くのだろう

translation.en: ♪ Guess I'll count a million stars Along the way ♪
translation.ja: 幾千もの星を― 数えることになるだろう

translation.en: ♪ And every time I start to worry ♪
translation.ja: それでも 　　不安になると必ず

translation.en: ♪ Something whispers in my ear ♪
translation.ja: 何かが耳に 　　ささやいてくれる

translation.en: ♪ Says the words I long to hear ♪
translation.ja: ずっと 　聞きたかった言葉を

translation.en: ♪ Almost home I'm almost home ♪
translation.ja: もうすぐ家だ あと少しで家に着く

translation.en: ♪ Might be lost and afraid But I'm just a dream away ♪
translation.ja: 道に迷い 不安な時も 夢では すぐそこに 　　　　　　 家がある

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home I'm almost home ♪
translation.ja: もうすぐ家だ あと少しで家に着く

translation.en: ♪ Feel so cold and alone ♪
translation.ja: たとえ寒くて孤独でも

translation.en: ♪ But I'm almost home ♪
translation.ja: もう少しだ もう少しで家に着く

translation.en: ♪ Just one more mile And I'll be home free ♪
translation.ja: あと１マイルで 　　家にたどり着ける

translation.en: ♪ Just one more day Is all my heart needs ♪
translation.ja: あと１日あれば― 安らぎが得られる

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get there ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm gonna get there someday ♪
translation.ja: 家に たどり着けるから いつか必ず

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ On my own ♪
♪ Might be lost and afraid But I'll get there someday ♪
translation.ja: 道に迷い 不安な時も いつか必ずたどり着く

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home Almost home ♪
translation.ja: もうすぐ家だ もう少しで家に着く

translation.en: ♪ Feel so cold and alone But I'm... ♪
translation.ja: たとえ寒くて孤独でも もう少しだ

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
translation.ja: 家は もうすぐそこだ

translation.en: Action.
Cut it.
